posts.post_title: FS/FT: T206 Mordecai Brown (Cubs shirt) PSA 7 $2600**SOLD**
posts.post_content: Pied 150 back, extremely difficult HOFer to find in high grade. A recent 8 sold for $10k, and the last couple of 7's have sold for much more than asking price. Please send me your email for pics, $2600 delivered, thanks... **SOLD**
